snippet: Washington’s usually reliable bullpen failed to protect a two-run lead, and the result was a 4-3 loss to the visiting Colorado Rockies on Sunday.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Colorado Rockies defeat Washington Nationals, 4-3; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Washington’s usually reliable bullpen failed to protect a two-run lead, and the result was a 4-3 loss to the visiting Colorado Rockies on Sunday.

headline.seo: Washington Nationals Limp Into Break but Are Still Standing Tall
headline.main: Nationals Limp Into Break but Are Still Standing Tall
headline.print_headline: Nationals, Despite a Defeat, Can Rest Easily at the Top
